Reviews.Title: Low-quality Chinese replica of old model Nexus One
Reviews.Author: vlad18m
Reviews.Content: "CELLULAR 5 STAR" sales low-quality Chinese replica of old model Nexus One for T-Mobile and simply lies stating that it supports AT&T; network... IT DOESN'T! Don't waste your time buying from them...

Reviews.Title: Delivered, as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: I'd decided to go with the Nexus One after, honestly, getting fed up with my MyTouch 3G.  The N1 is an upgrade on all levels.  It's snappier, smoother and sleeker.  This is the way Android was meant to be experienced.  The seller shipped the phone ahead of schedule and it arrived as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Nexus One - Screen Frustration
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: While the Nexus one is a slim, fast and full featured cell phone, the touch screen (how to interact with every aspect of the phone) is very lacking. I have also noticed the Android OS seems very buggy, rogue apps running without users knowing, or Android OS just destroys apps you have running in the background. My over all thoughts of the Nexus One/ Android OS: great idea, poorly executed.

ProductInfo.Name: Google Nexus One Phone - GSM Unlocked
